kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=BaseURI, url=http://localhost:3333, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3333/partners path_url=/partners headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth_user': 'qa', 'auth_password': 'ninja', 'Content-Length': '117'} body=b'{"name": "Posto do Papito", "email": "doceria@gmail.com", "whatsapp": "11999999999", "business": "Conveni\\u00eancia"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: PUT On Session
kw.doc: Sends a PUT request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: PUT Response : url=http://localhost:3333/partners/63460eb5f5e16f219ebf1a2c/enable status=200, reason=OK headers={'X-Powered-By': 'Express', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Expose-Headers': 'Authorization,auth_user,auth_password', 'Date': 'Wed, 12 Oct 2022 00:47:50 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=5', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

test.name: Should return 404 on enable a partner
